means: [冶]使（金属）与水银混合，使（金属）汞齐化

word_mean: 汞齐化，调制汞合金：在汞合金中加一金属

sentence.Network_en: Their company is planning to amalgamate with ours.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们公司正计划同我们公司合并.

sentence.Network_en: The unions will attempt to amalgamate their groups into one national body.
sentence.Network_cn: 工会将试图合并其群体纳入一个国家机构.

sentence.Network_en: Character: colorless , transparent liquid, with pungent smell, consistency : 1.049, melting point: 16.7℃, boiling point: 118℃. Amalgamate with water, ethanol and aether.
sentence.Network_cn: 性状: 无色澄清液体, 有刺激气味, 密度为 1.049,熔点为 16.7 ℃, 沸点为118℃. 溶于水 、 乙醇、乙醚.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: from medieval Latin amalgamat- 'formed into a soft mass', from the verb amalgamare, from amalgama (see amalgam)

entry.def: When two or more things, especially organizations, amalgamate or are amalgamated, they become one large thing.

example.ex: The firm has amalgamated with an American company...
example.tran: 该公司和一家美国公司合并了。

example.ex: The chemical companies had amalgamated into a vast conglomerate...
example.tran: 那些化学品公司已经合并成一个庞大的企业集团。

means.word_mean: 1. to bring or combine together or with something else;

auth_sentence.content: "We should amalgamate the two acts," he said, explaining that he was referring to drivers who could be proved to be at fault.
auth_sentence.res_content: "We should amalgamate the two acts," he said, explaining that he was referring to drivers who could be proved to be at fault.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: "We should amalgamate the two acts," he said, explaining that he was referring to drivers who could be proved to be at fault.

auth_sentence.content: The council wants to amalgamate Hampden Park Infants and Highfield Junior in Eastbourne into one school.
auth_sentence.res_content: The council wants to amalgamate Hampden Park Infants and Highfield Junior in Eastbourne into one school.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The council wants to amalgamate Hampden Park Infants and Highfield Junior in Eastbourne into one school.

auth_sentence.content: Working closely with nursing staff to amalgamate cleaners more closely with the hospital team will also help.
auth_sentence.res_content: Working closely with nursing staff to amalgamate cleaners more closely with the hospital team will also help.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Working closely with nursing staff to amalgamate cleaners more closely with the hospital team will also help.
